00034 /*
00035  * Vars class
00036  * - provide a repository of user variables
00037  * - read and write the repository to a single line string
00038  * - merge two repositories
00039  */
00040 require_once("class_lexer.inc");
00041 require_once("tools.inc");
00042 
00043 $chr2html = array(
00044     "\xa" => '&#10;',
00045     '|' => '&#124;',
00046     '=' => '&#61;',
00047     '&' => '&#38;',
00048     ';' => '&#59;');
00049 $html2chr = array_flip($chr2html);
00050 
00051 class Vars {
00052     var $vars;
00053 
00054     function Vars($frozen="") {
00055     unset($this->vars);
00056     if ($frozen != "") {
00057         $this->inject($frozen);
00058     } else {
00059         $this->vars = array();
00060     }
00061     }
00062 
00063     function tostring() {
00064     global $chr2html;
00065 
00066     reset($this->vars);
00067     list($k, $v) = each($this->vars);
00068     $r = strtr($k, $chr2html).'="'.
00069         strtr($v, $chr2html).'"';
00070 
00071     while (list($k, $v) = each($this->vars)) {
00072         $r .= ', '.strtr($k, $chr2html).'="'.
00073         strtr($v, $chr2html).'"';
00074     }
00075     return $r;
00076     }
00077 
00078     function merge($a, $b) {
00079     if (isset($a->vars)) {
00080         if (isset($b->vars)) {
00081         $this->vars = array_merge($a->vars, $b->vars);
00082         } else {
00083         $this->vars = $a->vars;
00084         }
00085     } else {
00086         $this->vars = $b->vars;
00087     }
00088     }
00089 
00090     function addvars($a) {
00091     if (isset($a->vars)) {
00092         $b = $this->vars;
00093         $this->vars = array_merge($b, $a->vars);
00094     }
00095     }
00096 
00097     function def($k, $v) {
00098     if (isset($this->vars[$k])) {
00099         return;
00100     } else {
00101         $this->vars[$k] = $v;
00102     }
00103     }
00104 
00105     function defp($k) {
00106     return isset($this->vars[$k]);
00107     }
00108 
00109     function get($n) {
00110     return $this->vars[$n];
00111     }
00112 
00113     function parse(&$lexer) {
00114     $token = '';
00115     $done_parsing = 0;
00116 
00117     while (!$done_parsing) {
00118         $name = $lexer->next_token();
00119 
00120         $equals = $lexer->next_token();
00121         if ($equals != '=') {
00122         $lexer->parse_error('Expecting name=value');
00123         }
00124 
00125         $value = $lexer->next_token();
00126         $this->set($name, $value);
00127 
00128         $token = $lexer->next_token();
00129 
00130         if ($token != ',') {
00131         $lexer->unget($token);
00132         $done_parsing = 1;
00133         }
00134     }
00135     }
00136 
00137     function set($n, $v) {
00138     $this->vars[$n] = $v;
00139     }
00140 
00141     function _display($name="vars") {
00142     if (is_array($this->vars)) {
00143         foreach ($this->vars as $key => $value) {
00144         print "\xa  ".$key.'='.$value;
00145         }
00146     }
00147     }
00148 }
00149 ?>
